text: I want to be a mom who listens.
author: Tori Spelling

text: I am proud of my kids, but I also want to make my mom proud of me. I'm still a momma's girl at the heart of the situation.
author: Tori Spelling

text: Sometimes I do envision just being a stay at home mom but not working isn't an option for me currently.
author: Tori Spelling

text: There are days when I struggle with wanting to be a full-time, stay-at-home mom, and feeling guilty about that because I work.
author: Tori Spelling

text: I got my first tattoo when I was 16 years old and I went with my mom to get it done - she has a bunch too so we're tattoo buddies now.
author: Josh Hutcherson
